title: Whenever I look at the England and Australia teams, I don't find differences - I find similarities
text:
A lot of pre-match talk about England and Australia concerns how different the two teams are and why the expectations are all on Eddie Jones’ side. The fact the Wallabies have seemed to be in disarray has added to this view. Yet every time I look at the teams I don't find differences, I find similarities.

Front row

The pack are doppelgangers. Both have a front row that likes to scrummage and play. England are uber powerful in this area and now have lads in Kyle Sinckler and Jamie George who love to move the ball, while Mako Vunipola was born to play fly-half. The weakest link is probably...
description: A lot of pre-match talk about England and Australia concerns how different the two teams are and why the expectations are all on Eddie Jones’ side.
